english.segment1: When I'm faithless, You are faithful. When I'm lonely, You surround me. And when I am empty, You drown me in your sweet embrace. And when I am broken, You come restore my joy again
english.segment2: chorus. la-la-la Hey la-la. la-la-la I sing for You. la-la-la Hey la-la. To demonstrate my love for You
english.segment3: When I'm far away, then You draw me. When I am afraid, You surround me. And when I am empty, You drown me in Your sweet embrace. And when I am broken, You come restore my joy again.
